markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Diverse Weapon Expert](/Feats.aspx?ID=5086) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 219 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Fighter](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=214)

**Prerequisites**
[Fighter Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=5081); expert in any kind of weapon or unarmed attack

</column>

---

Your proficiency ranks for simple weapons and martial weapons increase to expert, and your proficiency rank for advanced weapons increases to trained.
name: Diverse Weapon Expert
prerequisite: Fighter Dedication; expert in any kind of weapon or unarmed attack
prerequisite_markdown: [Fighter Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=5081); expert in any kind of weapon or unarmed attack
